original_title: Police open fire at three-wheeler in Galle
original_body_lines: Police have opened fire at a three-wheeler in the Karapitiya area in Galle, for disobeying a signal to stop the vehicle.
Accordingly, Police opened fire at the three-wheeler which ignored the signal to halt in Karapitiya, Galle.
Subsequently, however, the two persons who were in the three-wheeler fled the area, Police reported.
